contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Vuzenica | native_name = Občina Vuzenica | native_name_lang = sl | settlement_type = Town and [[Municipalities of Slovenia|Municipality]] | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Karte Vuzenica si.png | map_alt = | map_caption = Location of the Municipality of Vuzenica in Slovenia | pushpin_map = Slovenia | pushpin_label_position = bottom | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = Location of the Town of Vuzenica in Slovenia | latd = 46|latm = 36|lats = |latNS = N | longd = 15|longm = 10|longs = |longEW = E | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_type = region:SI_type:city_source:GNS-enwiki | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | coordinates_region = SI | subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] | subdivision_name = {{flag|Slovenia}} | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = | seat = | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = [[Mayor]] | leader_name = Franc - Franjo Golob | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | total_type = | area_total_km2 = 50.1 | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = <ref>[http://www.stat.si/popis2002/en/ Statistical Office of the Republic of Slovenia, census of 2002]</ref> | population_total = 2786 | population_as_of = 2002 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = [[Central European Time|CET]] | utc_offset1 = +01 | timezone1_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] | utc_offset1_DST = +02 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = | website = <!-- [http://www.example.com example.com] --> | footnotes = }} '''Vuzenica''' is a town and a [[municipality]] in northern [[Slovenia]]. It lies on the right bank of the [[Drava]] River and extends south into the [[Pohorje]] Hills. The area was part of the traditional region of [[Lower Styria|Styria]]. It is now included in the [[Koroška statistical region|Carinthia statistical region]].<ref>[http://www.vuzenica.si/ Vuzenica municipal site]</ref> Vuzenica was first mentioned as a settlement in written documents dating to 1238, but [[archaeological record|archaeological evidence]] points to much older settlement of the area with a [[Ancient Rome|Roman period]] [[cemetery|burial ground in the town]].<ref>[http://rkd.situla.org/ Slovenian Ministry of Culture register of national heritage] reference number ešd 8133</ref> Of the 13th-century castle above the settlement, only parts of the walls survive.<ref>[http://rkd.situla.org/ Slovenian Ministry of Culture register of national heritage] reference number ešd 8141</ref> The [[parish church]] in the town is dedicated to [[Saint Nicholas]] and belongs to the [[Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Maribor]]. It was built in the mid-13th century on the site of a 12th-century church. It was partly rebuilt and extended in the 14th and 15th centuries.<ref>[http://rkd.situla.org/ Slovenian Ministry of Culture register of national heritage] reference number ešd 857</ref> A second church in the town is dedicated to the [[Mary, mother of Jesus|Virgin Mary]] and dates to the late 14th century. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.geopedia.si/Geopedia_en.html?params=L408_F141_T973_vF_b4_x515149.5_y158687.5_s13 Municipality of Vuzenica on Geopedia] * [http://www.vuzenica.si/ Vuzenica municipal site] {{Vuzenica}} {{Municipalities of Slovenia}} [[Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Vuzenica]] [[Category:Municipalities of Slovenia]] {{Vuzenica-geo-stub}}
